alert.note: Alert for Allen; Avoyelles; Beauregard; East Cameron; Evangeline; Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; Northern Acadia; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Southern Acadia; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary; Upper Vermilion; Vernon; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 30 at 2:36PM CDT until November 01 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR CENTRAL AND SOUTHERN LOUISIANA TUESDAY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH FOR CENTRAL AND SOUTHERN LOUISIANA WEDNESDAY... .A Canadian high pressure system will build down into the region over the next few days. This system will bring a very dry air mass with low afternoon relative humidity values. Also, gusty north winds can be expected on Tuesday. With rainfall amounts on the light side and the area still in an exceptional drought, fuels will be critically dry. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM CDT TUESDAY FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES AND GUSTY NORTH WINDS FOR CENTRAL AND SOUTHERN LOUISIANA... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES AND CRITICALLY DRY FUELS FOR CENTRAL AND SOUTHERN LOUISIANA... The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a Red Flag Warning for low relative humidity and gusty north winds, which is in effect from 10 AM to 7 PM CDT Tuesday. A Fire Weather Watch has also been issued. This Fire Weather Watch for low relative humidity and critically dry fuels is in effect from Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Vernon, Rapides, Avoyelles, Beauregard, Allen, Evangeline, St. Landry, Lafayette, Upper St. Martin, Lower St. Martin, West Cameron, East Cameron, Northern Calcasieu, Northern Jefferson Davis, Northern Acadia, Upper Vermilion, Upper Iberia, Upper St. Mary, Southern Calcasieu, Southern Jefferson Davis, Southern Acadia, Lower Vermilion, Lower Iberia and Lower St. Mary. * TIMING...Red Flag Warning Tuesday 10 am to 7 pm. Fire Weather Watch Wednesday 10 am to 7 pm. * WINDS...On Tuesday, North 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. On Wednesday, Northeast winds 5 to 10 mph with gusts up to 15 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...On Tuesday, as low as 28 percent. On Wednesday, as low as 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fire that develops will likely spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
